channel.title: Research on Samden Lepcha
channel.description: Recent content in Research on Samden Lepcha

item.title: DeToxy
item.description: Abstract Toxic speech, also known as hate speech, is regarded as one of the crucial issues plaguing online social media today. Most recent work on toxic speech detection is constrained to the modality of text and written conversations with very limited work on toxicity detection from spoken utterances or using the modality of speech. In this paper, we introduce a new dataset DeToxy, the first publicly available toxicity annotated dataset for the En- glish language.
